Text: CC: Advance to Go (Collect $200)
CC: Bank error in your favour. Collect $200
CC: Doctors fee. Pay $50
CC: From sale of stock you get $50
CC: Get Out of Jail Free
CC: Go to Jail. Go directly to jail- do not pass Go- do not collect $200
CC: Holiday fund matures. Receive $100
CC: Income tax refund. Collect $20
CC: It is your birthday. Collect $10 from every player
CC: Life insurance matures. Collect $100
CC: Pay hospital fees of $100
CC: Pay school fees of $50
CC: Receive $25 consultancy fee
CC: You are assessed for street repairs. $40 per house. $115 per hotel
CC: You have won second prize in a beauty contest. Collect $10
CC: You inherit $100
Chance: Advance to Boardwalk.
Chance: Advance to Go (Collect $200).
Chance: Advance to Illinois Avenue. If you pass Go- collect $200.
Chance: Advance to St. Charles Place. If you pass Go- collect $200.
Chance: Advance to the nearest Railroad. If unowned- you may buy it from the Bank. If owned- pay wonder twice the rental to which they are otherwise entitled.
Chance: Advance to the nearest Railroad. If unowned- you may buy it from the Bank. If owned- pay wonder twice the rental to which they are otherwise entitled.
Chance: Advance token to nearest Utility. If unowned- you may buy it from the Bank. If owned- throw dice and pay owner a total ten times amount thrown.
Chance: Bank pays you dividend of $50.
Chance: Get Out of Jail Free.
Chance: Go Back 3 Spaces.
Chance: Go to Jail. Go directly to Jail- do not pass Go- do not collect $200.
Chance: Make general repairs on all your property. For each house pay $25. For each hotel pay $100.
Chance: Speeding fine $15.
Chance: Take a trip to Reading Railroad. If you pass Go- collect $200.
Chance: You have been elected Chairman of the Board. Pay each player $50.
Chance: Your building loan matures. Collect $150.
